                         ----> PLOT

            Virgil Tibbs is a renowed Homicide Detective from Philadelphia 
          returning to Mississippi in the sweltering summer to visit his
          mother, when a rich factory owner is found dead. The Industrialist 
          was white, Tibbs is black and in the deep south at the time, that 
          is enough reason for the local cops to arrest him on suspicion 
          murder. After his identity and credentials are established, the Chief 
          of Police lets Tibbs go and attempts to enlist his help in solving the 
          case. An uneasy and complicated relationship develops between the 
          southern Sherriff and the City slicker. Sidney Poitier stars as the 
          superior sleuth who rediscovers the small town racism he escaped through 
          his education. Rod Steiger is the local Sheriff who is forced to examine 
          his own prejudices and repent them.
